reviewText: My children love all the Moore Family films.  We made popcorn and snuggled on the couch as a family, laughing and learning together.  It's very entertaining for all ages - our children range from 1 to 12 years and they all enjoyed it.
Wonderful video. Our children have watched it over and over. Would love to have more videos produced by this family.
Our whole family loves this movie.  All of the Moore Family films are enjoyable and Christ-honoring.

This is a great little film (roughly 40 minutes) about a family that is in the business of making maple syrup. I had no clue what went into making maple syrup, so I found this film very informative. I thought it was great seeing how the whole family is involved in the process. I don't remember the toddler's name (the one on the cover), but he provides some great comedy relief.
